pkgmetadata.longdescription: # sphinx-basic-ngA modernised skeleton for Sphinx themes.## To demo this theme1. Clone this repository ```shell git clone https://github.com/pradyunsg/sphinx-basic-ng ```2. Install it locally ```shell pip install -e ./sphinx-basic-ng ```3. Install `nox` ```shell pip install nox ```4. Use `nox` to build a simple demo site ```shell nox -s docs-live -- ./tests/barebones ```
